name: Mega Fun
overview: Mega Fun is a 2004 Australian C64 game cartridge release that is actually a collection of three games that were never officially released outside of North America. They were all games that were originally published as type-in games from the North American based Ahoy! magazine They are: - Tenpins (called Tenpin Bowling on the menu screen): a basic, but fun horizontal bowling game - Meteor Run (called Meteor Runner on the menu screen): A side scrolling shooter in which you have to shoot meteors coming toward you - Vortex (a shooter in which you have to shoot and destroy a space station surrounded by a forcefield) Two of the three games were developed by Tony Brantner, while Vortex was developed by Sean D. Wagle.
